name: DefenderOne
description:
DefenderOne(Working Title)

Made by Marc in 48hours
for the GMTK Game Jam 2019
Theme: Only One

This is a one button space shooter
Press [Space] to orbit the planet
Enemies start cloaked
The sensor will reveal one enemy directly in front of you
Only one enemy will be revealed at a time

DefenderOneUpdated.zip has fixed typos and a minor bugs
